titles.title: Tim’s Act
Tim Hart Wildland Firefighter Classification and Pay Parity Act
Tim’s Act
To reform and enhance the pay and benefits of Federal wildland firefighters, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
